Description: Fragment of a lens: a fragment, about half, of a lens. The metal, of greenish cast, is transparent and is of fine quality.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie 'et al.', 'Tanis' I (1885), 49; C. Favard-Meeks in P. Brissaud & C. Zivie-Coche (eds), 'Tanis : travaux récents sur le tell Sân el-Hagar : Mission française des fouilles de Tanis, 1987-1997' (1998), p. 133.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 31 Jan-10 Sept 2006. Paris, Cite des sciences et l'industrie, 'Vitrum: l'arte vetrana e le scienze all'ombra del Vesuvio'.
